storyInfo: The priest's plot is inadvertently foiled by the party, who turn the Seaborn into a grand feast and prepare to venture into the sea for more ingredients. However, their actions only serve to terrify the local residents.

attributes.content: Oh? That noise...
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: I presumed they would have exercised more caution... Who would have thought they had such confidence?
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Heheh. No matter. The outcome will be the same.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: The church has need of men.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Become one of us.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Then we shall bring revelation to all Iberians.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: That should be the trap set.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Just need to wait for them to get enough ingredients and get out of there. Should be enough to buy them some time.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Man, Laios, sometimes you really do think of everything.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What's a treasure chest doing here?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Let me guess, this world has mimics too?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: This one's barely even trying.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: It's a beach! There's nothing here but sand! Who does it think it's trying to fool?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm? Footsteps... I bet it's that weird guy.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: They will become our brethren. Soon, soon, they will become something greater...
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Tch, it's him, alright. I knew he was sending us to our deaths.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I've got an idea.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: When the Inquisition comes, they too may have a taste.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: A taste of what?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Why... Why haven't you gone inside?
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: I'm not much of a fighter myself, so I'm waiting outside.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: ...Is that so?
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: You mentioned the Inquisition. Who're they?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Our common enemy.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Oh, mind telling me more?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (It seems this Durin has no talent for combat. I suppose there's no harm in chatting with him.)
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: (With his build, where could he even run off to?)
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: I do not mind.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: We might be seen talking here. How about we go chat by that chest?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Let us begin with how the Inquisition have been fooling the people of Iberiaâ€”eh?
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: (Slams open) (Devours whole) (Clamps shut) (Sways contently)
You might call them your brethren, but you don't know the first thing about these monsters.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: When you're in a party like ours, that'll cost you dearly.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: *phew* That's all of them handled!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I thought there'd be a lot more.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If they were living alongside the kraken, most probably fled when it died.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The ones who killed it in the first place must have exquisite taste...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Think these monsters are edible, Senshi?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Well, I'm certainly not eating any! They're disgusting!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think as long as we handle them carefully, we can turn them into healthy, delicious meals!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: We're not that far from the city though, or particularly hidden. There's no reason the locals wouldn't know of this place.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If they won't eat any of this stuff, surely that means none of it's edible?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That mysterious priest must have sent us here to die!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Not necessarily.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: These are monsters, after all. We didn't see any weapons in town, so maybe they can't hunt here, not that they won't.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Seafood's a good source of protein. If we can make a proper meal out of them, I'm sure it'll be filling.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: NonononoNO!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: There's nothing wrong with it, the way I see it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I might not have cooked a kraken before, but I know how to handle fish, shellfish, prawns, and octopus.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Just a reminder that we don't have anything else to eat anyway. Other than whatever washes up on the beach.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I know, okay?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This one's got a transparent head full of... some sort of sticky liquid? It surrounds the organs and this yellow thing...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Definitely can't eat the organs. Let's have a look at that yellow stuff and the liquid...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Really reminds me of an egg.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'll try beating it in a bowl later.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Looks like the inside of an egg to me too.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You two do realize we're in the middle of taking care of the monsters, right? Can you save the cooking talk for later?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't say that! This is the best way to research monsters in general.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Have you noticed how you've already helped us cook these sea anemone monsters, Marcille?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Oh, you're right.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think it's a bit burnt after getting hit by explosion magic.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Then there's this strange seagrass. It just withered up in the fire.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It's probably inedible, right? How about we hold off on trying it?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think you kept the heat just right.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Doesn't seem like there's any more coming out from deeper in. Guessing they're afraid of us.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I think we've gathered enough monster parts for a feast. Let's go.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Huh. Chilchuck, why's there a treasure chest next to you?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And that man out cold over there... Is that the priest?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yep. Thought he could talk us into walking to our deaths, so I decided I'd use this chest to teach him a lesson.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Wait, he was lying to us? We really did manage to get lots of seafood there, though.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And did you just say 'this guy'?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Yeah. *sigh* I figured this world was going to have mimics, too.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Slams open) (Slapped by Chilchuck) (Unable to reach anything) (Shakes angrily)
Seems you've got it under control.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Well, it's pretty crappy at hiding itself.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Anyway, I assume you're going to want to see what this world's mimics taste like, so here, take it.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Wow, really?! You're the best!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Whispers) Does this count as playing nice with him?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Whispers) Probably.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Whispers) You're a good egg, lad.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: (Whispers) Shut up!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: C'mon, let's go start a fire on the beach!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Let's start by opening up this one that looks like a sea anemone.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I was thinking earlier... It should be here... Yep, there it is! Its head is on the bottom.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Eh? That flower organ on the top isn't its head?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Let's cut it open and get a better look. The head's structured a lot like a starfish...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Peel back its skin a bit...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Oho, it really is all yellow inside! Every 'petal' seems to be the same. I think this is its reproductive organ.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Now I really don't feel like eating it.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I know, I know, I'm not gonna eat another sea creature raw.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Like I said, you need to handle that stuff carefully or you're definitely getting a stomachache!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But properly-made normal ceviche and sashimi are delicious. Remember that for next time!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Then, how do you properly prepare 'normal' raw food?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hah! Told you not to say anything!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Well? Go on.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Add mustard, lemon slices, onion, coriander, and minced garlic to soy sauce. If you have fish sauce, add a dash if you'd like, then in goes the raw seafood. Mix well and leave to marinate.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Something along those lines.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Sounds great!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...But we don't have any soy sauce or mustard.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We do have this. I noticed half a box of... 'Emergency Sanity Potions' tucked away in a corner of the cave.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Says here: 'Contains mustard extract.' Might be some sort of seasoning.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: ...'Manufactured by Rhodes Island'?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: A product of the place we're looking for. If this is here, we might be closer than we thought.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Might as well use it to give the meat some flavor.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Just need to cut these up into the right size, put them in a container, add in some 'Emergency Sanity Potion,' onion and minced garlic, then finally add the raw meat and mix it all together...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Here, try some.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Delicious!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: As for everything else...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: A big pile of roast seagrass.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: About a dozen of those egg monsters.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Another dozen of the sea anemone ones.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And one mimic.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yep, this should be plenty.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And there you have it.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It looks like a lot, but there's still plenty left over. Should be enough to feed the city folk.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It all smells amazing.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hmm... Even though it's a monster meat feast, it actually looks pretty good once it's all cooked.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Do you really plan to share all this with the people in town? Seems to me like you guys are itching to dig in.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: But they don't even understand us when we speak...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I've got a plan.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We start eating here, by the coast, which will attract those wandering the beach.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's clear they still possess some sort of reason. We let them eat their fill, then they can share the rest with their friends.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: So, just an excuse after all.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm... The locals might not be too familiar with this style of cooking. I do think we should demonstrate that it's edible first.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You heard him. Eat up, everyone.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I want more seaweed alcohol!
Oh, you're such a glutton.
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: Because it's delicious!
Well, I'm glad you like it.
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: I hope the singer will like it too, the next time she stops by.
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: The outsiders are at the beach.
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: Huh? The beach?
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: What are they doing there?
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: Cooking.
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: Cooking?
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: With monsters from the sea.
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: What?! I need to go stop them, quick!
attributes.name: Anita

attributes.content: Too late.
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: This ceviche is really sharp.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Texture's good though. Haven't had anything like it before.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: This world's mimics turned out to be pretty tasty too.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Kin... We many... What's that smell? It's good...
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Oh. That lying priest's woken up.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: So very good... Wait, what are you doing?! You... What the hell is that you're cooking?!
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Oh, hey there, Mister Priest. That cave you told us about really was full of seafood!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The townspeople don't need to go hungry any longer!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Want to try some?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You... You... This is blasphemy! Blasphemy of the highest order!
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: M-My brethren, I will not allowâ€”
attributes.name: Priest

attributes.content: Oh dear. Looks like he's passed out again.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Maybe he's hungry?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I've got it! We can gather up some of that strange seagrass and use the tingle to wake him up!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I already told you, he tried to get us killed! Why do you care about him so much?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: No matter how you cut it, Chilchuck, we're only having this feast thanks to him.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We ought to show our gratitude somehow.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I really don't get you.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Alright, come help me gather some seagrass while the bonfire's still lit!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey, you're just doing this because you're still hungry!
attributes.name: Chilchuck & Marcille

attributes.content: Augh, the water's so cold...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Anita finally reaches the shore, but it seems she is too late.
Upon a beach fallen into silence, people have gathered for the first time in a long while.
A group of four have rolled up their trousers and waded into the sea in high spirits, breaking out into laughter on occasion.
Wow! There's creatures here nibbling at my toes!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Huh? Th-Then doesn't that mean the stuff we just ate was...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That's just how things are in most places, Marcille.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I think I hear people yelling behind us.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh wow, there's some glowing round thing over there! I'm gonna go have a look!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Ahh! Ahhhhh!!
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: Theyâ€”! Th-th-th-theyâ€”!
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: AHHHHHHHH!
attributes.name: Male Resident

attributes.content: All Anita can think of while looking at the scene before her is that...
It seems the sea breeze blowing towards Sal Viento today is stinging her eyes. All this is... something she never imagined she'd see her entire life.
